sourcesContent:
import React from "react" const ProductItem = props => { const { product } = props return(
{product.name}{" "} ${product.price}
{product.shortDesc}
{product.stock > 0 ? ( {product.stock + " Avaliable"} ) : ( Out of Stock )}
) } export default ProductItem
